title: NLFS: Fred H. Wagner Cubs Team Postcard with Oct 1906 postmark
author: timn1

posts.post_title: NLFS: Fred H. Wagner Cubs Team Postcard with Oct 1906 postmark
posts.post_content:
A slice of baseball history here - mailed from Chicago on October 5, 1906 - when the Cubs dynasty was at its peak just before running into the Hitless Wonder World Series buzzsaw.  Unfortunately someone has sliced the card a bit on two sides as you can see from the back - but it's still a great piece, and not one of the ones you usually see from this season.  

Staying with me for the moment…
